name: Give me a Break! Quiz / Test | Unique Quizzes | 15 Questions

questions.text: Start by typing GIVEMEABREAK, just like that, without spaces or anything.
Now turn all the Es into Ts.
Now reverse the last 3 letters in the word.
Move the R to the very end of the word.
Change the M into an H.
Move the first A one spot to the left.
Now move the B to the left of the R.
Now make the V a T.
Add an F after the B.
Move the letters GIT right before the K.
Now add an O to the beginning of the phrase.
Now change the G into a K.
Move the F to the right of the O.
Add an A after the B.
Finally, put spaces between the words to finish a famous candy jingle.
questions.correct: Of that Kit Kat bar & Of that Kitkat bar
questions.explanation:
Of that Kit Kat bar & Of that Kitkat bar.

	The famous KitKat bar jingle: "Give me a break, give me a break.  Break me off a piece of that KitKat bar!"
